lib/chain.js

This module manages blockchains and their rpc connections.

var geth = require("geth"); var config = { ethereum: { name: 'ethereum', rpc_url: '', connection: { type: 'geth', config: { port: 30303, rpcport: 8545 } }, }, } module.exports = { config: config, start: function(config, cb) { geth.configure(config); geth.start(function(err, proc) { console.log("geth cb"); cb(err, proc); }); } }
